venue.name: Unleashed by Petco at the Bunker Hill Mall

item.description: We will be having our next Frenchie Fun Day again on Sunday 4/7 from 1pm-2pm. We will as be offering free Pup Yogurt and treats. And as always our Dog Trainer John will be On Hand to ensure that safety and fun is had by all during the Indoor Playtime!! Our last Frenchie Fun Day was a blast and we look forward to Having you all back again! If you have not been to an Unleashed Event please bring your Frenchies up to date vaccination information and This event is FREE as are all of our events.

group.name: The Boston French Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: Indoor play at Unleashed Charlestown!
